00224     T* getByIndex(const unsigned int index) const {
00225       if (index > _maxIndex) return 0;
00226 
00227       DataWithAddress *dataWithAddr = _orderedData[index];
00228       if (dataWithAddr) return dataWithAddr->getData();
00229       else return 0;
00230     }

00238     void checkMapping() {
00239       if ( _mapperVersion != _mapper->getVersion() ) refillOrderedData(_mapper->getMaxIndex());
00240     }

00242     void contentModified() {
00243       ++_version;
00244     };

00249     class DataWithAddress {
00250     public:
00251       DataWithAddress(const int address, T* data) : _address(address), _data(data) {;}
00252       int getAddress() const { return _address; }
00253       T* getData() const {return _data; }
00254     private:
00255       int _address;
00256       T* _data;
00257     };

00276   template <class T>
00277   void MappedContainer<T>::fillByIndex(const unsigned int index, T* object, bool unique) {
00278 
00279     if (index > _maxIndex) throw BadDataException("Index out of range, are you filling an not existing channel?\n");
00280 
00281     if (_orderedData.at(index) && unique) {
00282       std::ostringstream error;
00283       error << "index " << index << std::dec << " already filled and has to be unique" << std::endl;
00284       throw BadDataException(error.str());
00285     }
00286 
00287     DataWithAddress *objectWithAddress = new DataWithAddress(_mapper->getCellIDOfIndex(index),object);
00288     _orderedData.at(index) = objectWithAddress;
00289 
00290     contentModified();
00291   }
00292 
00293   template <class T>
00294   T* MappedContainer<T>::removeByIndex(const unsigned int index) {
00295 
00296     if (index > _maxIndex) return 0;
00297 
00298     DataWithAddress *dataWithAddr = _orderedData[index];
00299     if (! dataWithAddr) return 0;
00300 
00301     T* object = dataWithAddr->getData();
00302     delete _orderedData[index];
00303     _orderedData[index] = 0;
00304 
00305     contentModified();
00306 
00307     return object;
00308   }
00309 
00310   template <class T>
00311   void MappedContainer<T>::deleteByIndex(const unsigned int index) {
00312 
00313     if (index > _maxIndex) return;
00314 
00315     DataWithAddress *dataWithAddr = _orderedData[index];
00316     if (! dataWithAddr) return;
00317 
00318     if (_deleteElements) delete dataWithAddr->getData();
00319     delete dataWithAddr;
00320     _orderedData[index] = 0;
00321 
00322     contentModified();
00323   }
00324 
00325   template <class T>
00326   void MappedContainer<T>::fillByCellID(const int cellID, T* object, bool unique) {
00327     checkMapping();
00328 
00329     fillByIndex(_mapper->getIndexByCellID(cellID),object,unique);
00330   }

00333   void MappedContainer<T>::fillByModuleID(const int channelID, T* object, bool unique) {
00334     checkMapping();
00335 
00336     fillByIndex(_mapper->getIndexByModuleID(channelID),object,unique);
00337   }

00339   template <class T>
00340   void MappedContainer<T>::fillByDAQID(const int DAQID, T* object, bool unique) {
00341     checkMapping();
00342 
00343     fillByIndex(_mapper->getIndexByDAQID(DAQID),object,unique);
00344   }

00346   template <class T>
00347   void MappedContainer<T>::refillOrderedData(const unsigned int size) {
00348 
00349     _mapperVersion = _mapper->getVersion();
00350 
00351     std::vector<DataWithAddress*> temporayCopy;
00352     for (unsigned int i =0; i< _orderedData.size();++i)
00353       if (_orderedData[i]) temporayCopy.push_back(_orderedData[i]);
00354 
00355     initOrderedData(size, false);
00356 
00357     for ( typename std::vector<DataWithAddress*>::iterator iter = temporayCopy.begin(); iter != temporayCopy.end(); ++iter) {
00358       fillByIndex(_mapper->getIndexByCellID((*iter)->getAddress()),(*iter)->getData(),false);
00359       delete (*iter);
00360     }
00361   }
00362 
00363   template <class T>
00364   void MappedContainer<T>::initOrderedData(const unsigned int size, const bool clearAddresses) {
00365     if (clearAddresses)
00366       for ( typename std::vector<DataWithAddress*>::iterator iter = _orderedData.begin(); iter != _orderedData.end(); ++iter) {
00367         if ( *iter ) {
00368 
00369           if ( _deleteElements ) delete (*iter)->getData();
00370 
00371           delete (*iter);
00372         }
00373       }
00374     _orderedData.clear();
00375     _orderedData.resize(size,0);
00376     _maxIndex = size;
00377 
00378     contentModified();
00379   }
00380 
00381   template <class T>
00382   std::vector<T*> MappedContainer<T>::getAllElements() const {
00383     std::vector<T*> result;
00384     for (unsigned int i =0; i< _orderedData.size();++i)
00385       if (_orderedData[i]) result.push_back(_orderedData[i]->getData());
00386     return result;
00387   }
